identity.description: Sistem HR modern dan minimalis untuk pengelolaan karyawan yang efisien.

usage_rules: Use Inter for all body text, inputs, and data tables.
Use font-medium (500) for data labels to ensure readability.

primary.name: Professional Blue
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key highlights

layout.spacing_system: Generous spacing. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 border border-white/20 shadow-sm
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for hover states, shadow-lg for modals
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-border. Use rounded-xl for containers, rounded-md for interactive elements.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle gradients only. No full-screen gradients. Use gradients for active borders or small accents.

login_background.description: Abstract blue modern office background for login page

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the 'Bento' grid layout defined in layout.grid_strategy.
Use Shadcn UI components for all interactive elements but customize them with the classes defined in components.
Ensure all text is in Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia).
Use the provided image URLs for avatars and backgrounds.
Implement a light/dark mode toggle in the sidebar or top bar.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do not use generic 'lorem ipsum'. Use realistic Indonesian names and data (e.g., 'Budi Santoso', 'Departemen IT').
For the Employee Database, use a clean Data Table with search and filter capabilities.
For the Dashboard Overview, use cards to show 'Total Karyawan', 'Departemen', etc., and a chart for distribution.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers or overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays can be used for premium feel.
